RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention: Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention Center

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Juvenile Justice Department: department where juveniles may be committed for rehabilitation upon violating probation conditions, offering various services including behavioral, family counseling, anger management, responsibility, substance abuse, mental health, and educational programs. J.M.E. was committed to this department.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention: detention center where J.M.E. failed to comply with requirements
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Southwest Keys Program: program completed after intensive supervision probation, part of J.M.E.'s rehabilitation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Youth Village: facility providing Cognitive Life Skills program as part of rehabilitation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Webb County Jail: jail where J.M.E. attended school and received services, including CAPS counseling and SCAN services
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Counseling and Psychological Services: counseling services attended by J.M.E. as a condition of probation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.SCAN Services: services received by J.M.E. as part of his rehabilitation program
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Constitution: constitution under which complaint of cruel and unusual punishment was made
